headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Holiday Bonuses: 25% Discounts, Pinstripe Smoking Jacket & Pajama Set Unlock
content:
Gift yourself something special with 25% off select items now through January 2nd including luxury vehicles like the Enus Super Diamond, real estate including Eclipse Towers Penthouses & weaponry like the Sweeper Shotgun.

You've also unlocked the sophisticated Bold Pinstripe Smoking Jacket and Pajamas set just by logging in. You can pickup your free set from any clothing retailer across Los Santos.

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
